price: Basi akatoka, naye ana khofu, akiangalia huku na huku. Akasema: Mola wangu Mlezi! Niokoe na watu madhaalimu.
arabic: فَخَرَجَ مِنۡهَا خَآئِفٗا يَتَرَقَّبُۖ قَالَ رَبِّ نَجِّنِي مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
footnotes: Musa akautoka mji naye amejaa khofu wasije maadui wakamdhuru, akimnyenyekea Mwenyezi Mungu amwokoe na udhalimu wa makafiri.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fakharaja min'hā khāifan yataraqqabu qāla rabbi najjinī mina al-qawmi al-ẓālimīna
